artist: Artist: Hayashi Rōen; Author: Inscribed by Tanomura Chikuden
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Barbara Porterfield
description: front 3/4 view of woman in white robes looking over PR shoulder; woman has subtle smile and holds object in outstretched hands; two line inscription URQ
inscription: URQ:瑶池觞罷三千餘春紅顔不改陵陸掦塵
markings: URC, rectangular relief; URQ, two square intaglios: 竹田?;憲?; LLC, two square intaglios:　又新； ??
signed: URQ: 天保辛卯孟夏日 田瞏題;　LLQ:閬苑{Rōen}
title: Female Chinese Immortal Ma Ku
